availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James H. Brooks (Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Married to Sallie Brown Brooks in Hopkins County, Kentucky, on October 15, 1854. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 625.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994039, Hopkins County Marriages.
"J. H. Brooks (1827-1877r)," Find A Grave, Memorial #42957711, accessed February 24, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/42957711.
